title: 香港民主派议员邝俊宇被捕！！
contents:
来源：華爾街狠人

【#鄺俊宇 #旺角 被捕片段】
防暴突然推倒鄺俊宇，再故意用膝頭壓鄺俊宇頭部落地，隨即用胡椒噴霧攻擊記者，並阻擋記者視線。

The riot police pushed Legislative Council member Roy Kwong onto the ground out of a sudden and intentionally knelt on his head. The riot polie also assaulted the press nearby with pepper spray attempting to block their vision and cameras.
